current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to assist States to rehabilitate or replace certain
			 bridges, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Strengthen And Fortify Existing Bridges Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Strengthen And Fortify Existing Bridges Act of 2014

header.#text:
Assistance to
			 States to rehabilitate or replace certain bridges

text.#text:
In
			 this section:

term.#tail:
means a bridge on a public road, without regard to
			 whether the bridge is on a Federal-aid highway.

term.#tail:

text.#text: The term

has significant load-carrying elements that
			 are in poor or worse condition due to deterioration, damage, or both;

has a load capacity that is significantly
			 below truckloads using the bridge and that requires replacement; or

has a waterway opening causing frequent
			 flooding of the bridge deck and approaches resulting in significant
			 traffic
			 interruptions.

shall establish a
			 program to assist States to rehabilitate or replace eligible bridges.
